metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12545 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Jetty version 9.3.x and 9.4.x, the server is vulnerable to Denial of Service conditions if a remote client sends either large SETTINGs frames container containing many settings, or many small SETTINGs frames. The vulnerability is due to the additional CPU and memory allocations required to handle changed settings.

criterions.comment: jetty8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
